# Humans
Depending on who you ask, humans are either unremarkable or the universal standard to which everything else is compared.
They interact [color=#ffa500]about 20% faster[/color] compared to other species.
## Lore
Humanity, while not possessing extraordinary abilities, are renowned throughout the galaxy as a species who have mastered the transition from origin world to space. This is not only because they are the only species to have created multiple genetic offshoots but are as well a species who has had a multitude of it's origin world cultures survive well beyond the original first step into the stars.
